sentences.en: And these industries were large enough to offer jobs to each class of worker, from unskilled laborer to manager or engineer.
sentences.cn: 这些行业足够壮大，可以为每一类工人提供工作，从非技术工人到经理或工程师。

sentences.en: His father, an agricultural laborer, drank and gambled.
sentences.cn: 他的父亲，一名农业劳动者，酗酒而且好赌。

sentences.en: Any common laborer can afford a cheap nylon satchel.
sentences.cn: 任何一个普通人都买的起一个便宜的尼龙包。
